languages.text: {n}Внезапно охрипнув, Соломон рокочуще произносит:{/n} "А дальше — все. Разрешите идти, Вольный Торговец". {n}Не дожидаясь ваших слов, арбитр разворачивается на каблуках.{/n}
{n}Suddenly hoarse, Solomorne says in a low, rumbling voice,{/n} "Now nothing. Requesting permission to leave, Rogue Trader." {n}Without waiting for a response, the Arbitrator turns on his heel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Внезапно охрипнув, Соломон рокочуще произносит:{/n} "А дальше — все. Разрешите идти, Вольный Торговец". {n}Не дожидаясь ваших слов, арбитр разворачивается на каблуках.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne rumbles, his voice suddenly hoarse,{/n} "Now nothing. Requesting permission to leave, Rogue Trader." {n}Without waiting for a response, the Arbitrator turns on his heel.{/n}
{n}Solomorne rumbles, his voice suddenly hoarse,{/n} "Now nothing. Requesting permission to leave, Rogue Trader." {n}Without waiting for a response, the Arbitrator turns on his heel.{/n}
{n}Solomorne grunts, his voice suddenly hoarse:{/n} "Now nothing. Requesting permission to leave, Rogue Trader." {n}Without waiting for a response, the Arbitrator turns on his heel.{/n}
{n}Solomorne grunts, his voice suddenly hoarse:{/n} "Now nothing. Requesting permission to leave, Rogue Trader." {n}Without waiting for a response, the Arbitrator turns on his heel.{/n}
{n}Suddenly hoarse, Solomorne says in a low, rumbling voice,{/n} "Now nothing. Requesting permission to leave, Rogue Trader." {n}Without waiting for a response, the Arbitrator turns on his heel.{/n}
{n}Suddenly hoarse, Solomorne says in a low, rumbling voice,{/n} "Now nothing. Requesting permission to leave, Rogue Trader." {n}Without waiting for a response, the Arbitrator turns on his heel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}突如として声がかすれ、ソロモーンは低く唸るような声で言った。{/n}「もう、何も言うことはありません。ローグトレーダー、退出の許可を願います」{n}返答を待つことなく、アービトレイターは踵を返した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly hoarse, Solomorne says in a low, rumbling voice,{/n} "Now nothing. Requesting permission to leave, Rogue Trader." {n}Without waiting for a response, the Arbitrator turns on his heel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}突如として声がかすれ、ソロモーンは低く唸るような声で言った。{/n}「もう、何も言うことはありません。ローグトレーダー、退出の許可を願います」{n}返答を待つことなく、アービトレイターは踵を返した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne wird plötzlich heiser und sagt mit tiefer, donnernder Stimme:{/n} Gar nichts. Bitte um Erlaubnis, wegzutreten, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}Ohne auf eine Antwort zu warten, dreht sich der Arbitrator um und geht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly hoarse, Solomorne says in a low, rumbling voice,{/n} "Now nothing. Requesting permission to leave, Rogue Trader." {n}Without waiting for a response, the Arbitrator turns on his heel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne wird plötzlich heiser und sagt mit tiefer, donnernder Stimme:{/n} Gar nichts. Bitte um Erlaubnis, wegzutreten, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}Ohne auf eine Antwort zu warten, dreht sich der Arbitrator um und geht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La voix de Solomorne se fait plus rauque et il vous répond d'un ton caverneux :{/n} « Il ne se passera plus rien. Je vous demande la permission de partir, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. » {n}Sans attendre votre réponse, l'arbitrator tourne les talons.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly hoarse, Solomorne says in a low, rumbling voice,{/n} "Now nothing. Requesting permission to leave, Rogue Trader." {n}Without waiting for a response, the Arbitrator turns on his heel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de Solomorne se fait plus rauque et il vous répond d'un ton caverneux :{/n} « Il ne se passera plus rien. Je vous demande la permission de partir, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. » {n}Sans attendre votre réponse, l'arbitrator tourne les talons.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne replica con voz grave:{/n} «Ahora nada. Solicito permiso para retirarme, Comerciante Independiente». {n}El Arbitrator da media vuelta sin esperar tu respuesta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly hoarse, Solomorne says in a low, rumbling voice,{/n} "Now nothing. Requesting permission to leave, Rogue Trader." {n}Without waiting for a response, the Arbitrator turns on his heel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne replica con voz grave:{/n} «Ahora nada. Solicito permiso para retirarme, Comerciante Independiente». {n}El Arbitrator da media vuelta sin esperar tu respuesta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙的声音突然喑哑下来，他以低沉的隆隆声回答道。{/n}“接下来就什么都没有了。请求你允许我离开，行商浪人。”{n}索罗蒙没等你回应，就转身离开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly hoarse, Solomorne says in a low, rumbling voice,{/n} "Now nothing. Requesting permission to leave, Rogue Trader." {n}Without waiting for a response, the Arbitrator turns on his heel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙的声音突然喑哑下来，他以低沉的隆隆声回答道。{/n}“接下来就什么都没有了。请求你允许我离开，行商浪人。”{n}索罗蒙没等你回应，就转身离开了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, alçak ama gümbürdeyen bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Aramızda hiçbir şey yok. Ayrılmak için müsaadeni rica ediyorum Hür Tacir." {n}Yargıcı, cevap bile beklemeden topuklarının üzerinde dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly hoarse, Solomorne says in a low, rumbling voice,{/n} "Now nothing. Requesting permission to leave, Rogue Trader." {n}Without waiting for a response, the Arbitrator turns on his heel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aniden kısık bir sesle Solomorne alçak ve gümbürdeyen bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Aramızda hiçbir şey yok. Ayrılmak için müsaadeni rica ediyorum Hür Tacir," {n}Yargıcı, cevap bile beklemeden topuklarının üzerinde dönüyor.{/n}
